Verify the current time is displayed as '02:00' and total duration as '60:00'
Verify the audio player has an offset height of 80px
Verify the volume control is at 80% with an aria-label 'Volume control'
Start the onboarding flow at 'https://onboarding.app/start'
Verify there are 5 step indicators
Verify the second indicator has a background color #007bff and a border radius of 50%
Verify the 'Next' button displays 'Next Step', is enabled, has background color #198754, and is clickable
Verify the 'Back' button is disabled on the first step
Verify the 'Back' button is enabled on the second step
Verify the progress text is 'Step 2 of 5'
Verify the step indicators transform scale to 1.1 on hover
Verify the container has overflow x hidden
View the recipe card for 'Chicken Stir-fry'
Verify the recipe card container has a width of 350px, background color #ffffff, and a box shadow of 0px 6px 12px rgba(0,0,0,0.15)
Verify the recipe image 'stirfry.jpg' has a height of 220px and object fit 'cover'
Verify the title text 'Quick Chicken Stir-fry' has font size 26px and color #343a40
Verify the 'Prep Time' is '25 minutes' with font size 15px
Verify there are exactly 7 ingredients listed with a list-style-type 'square'
Verify the image applies a filter blur(3px) on hover
Access 'https://analytics.io/dashboard'
Verify the widget container has a width of 450px, height of 300px, border 1px solid #dcdcdc, and padding 25px
Verify the chart canvas is visible, has a width of 100%, and a height of 200px
Verify data labels on the chart have font size 13px and color #555555 for both x and y axes
Verify the 'Refresh Data' button has a 'refresh' icon, is clickable, and triggers a data update animation lasting 0.6s
Verify the 'Last Updated' timestamp is '2023-11-20 14:45:30'
Verify the chart uses a clip path for rendering
Scroll to the page footer on 'https://corporate.website/'
Verify the footer section has background color #212529, padding 40px 0, and text color #ffffff

Verify there are 6 navigation links ('About Us', 'Services', 'Portfolio', 'Careers', 'Privacy Policy', 'Contact'), each with text color #ffffff, font size 14px, display inline-block, and a margin right of 25px
Verify the copyright text '© 2023 Global Solutions Corp.' has font size 13px
Verify there are 4 social media icons (Facebook, Twitter, LinkedIn, Instagram), each with SVG fill #ffffff, width 28px, and height 28px, changing fill color to #00aced on hover
Verify the 'Privacy Policy' link has an aria-label 'Read our privacy policy'
